generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, including a pedestrian crossing and tram tracks, which are all part of the road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the image, separated from the road by a railing, where several people are standing.
- building: A building with a sloped roof is visible in the background, behind the trees and the railing.
- fence: A metal fence with vertical bars is visible along the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including utility poles and traffic light poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.

- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible throughout the image, both in the foreground and background.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, above the trees and buildings.
- person: Several people are visible in the image, including pedestrians crossing the street and people standing on the sidewalk.
- rider: Two individuals are riding bicycles in the image, one on the left and one on the right.
- car: A black car is visible in the image, parked on the right side of the street.
- bicycle: Two bicycles are visible in the image, one being ridden by a person on the left and the other by a person on the right.
